item.title: Python + R Studio
item.description: Switching Coding Languages Do you ever hit a snag when coding and think, "Dang! I know how to do this in Python, but I've already started my project in R!" Never fear, there is a quick and easy way to switch between coding languages. Reticulate lets R and python talk to each other, so you can convert R objects to Python objects and Python objects back into R objects. It offers the perfect solution for when you want to use a different coding language.
